name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Aha, so there's a chance!     If I purchase four differently numbered tickets, I'll now have a better chance than the Avengers at beating Thanos!    ...    It sounded way more epic in my head. Haha!

source_obj.text: Aha, so there's a chance!     If I purchase four differently numbered tickets, I'll now have a better chance than the Avengers at beating Thanos!    ...    It sounded way more epic in my head. Haha!

replies.text: Jaime L. Garcia  That's still infinitely greater than nothing!
The only way Dr. Strange saw involved Tony Stark having a hug moment with Peter Parker.
